org.cyberborean.rdfbeans.datatype

Class DefaultDatatypeMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyberborean.rdfbeans.datatype.DefaultDatatypeMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatatypeMapper

    public class DefaultDatatypeMapper
extends Object
implements DatatypeMapper

    Default DatatypeMapper implementation based on XML-Schema data types for representation of Java primitive wrapper classes and dates as typed RDF literals.

    • Instances of String are represented as plain (untyped) RDF literals.
    • Instances of Boolean, Integer, Float, Double, Byte, Long and Short are represented as RDF literals with corresponding XML-Schema datatypes.
    • Instances of Date are represented as RDF literals of xsd:dateTime type, serialized into ISO8601 date/time format.
